value:
It is hard to believe that I, after
losing my life, would join Askr's
fight.

I wonder what has befallen our land,
Múspell. My thoughts turn to my
sister. Is Laevatein all right?

Princess Fjorm is my friend. If the
time comes when I must fight her...

I have no great talent as a warrior...
Having said that, I do believe I may
be of some aid with your campaign.

In life, my sister was my sole ally.
To have a friend... It is something
I had never considered.

I am Laegjarn, a general in the army
of $Nf. Greetings.

I will fight using my own strength,
not that of the flame dragon Múspell.

I am Laegjarn, warrior sworn to
$Nu!

I must get stronger...for Fjorm's sake
as well.

You have my thanks. I will
demonstrate my newfound
strength to you.

I am Laegjarn. My guise may be of
one bound to serve the flame dragon
Múspell, but my will is my own.

The desire to protect someone dear...
It is a wellspring of strength, and it
alone sustained me as I fought.$k$pPrincess Fjorm, a friend without
equal, has also become dear to me.
So I must ask you this...$k$pWhat are your feelings toward the
princess? And have you considered
her feelings?$k$pIn truth, it is not my place to say
even this much, but I will add just
one thing.$k$pAny who treat her feelings lightly
will have to answer to me. You
would do well to consider this.
せやっ！
炎よ！
ぐっ！
I will not break...
By my flame!
I will burn my regrets.
Disgrace leaves a brand.
To protect my friends!
Princess Fjorm...
Sigh
Múspell, god of flame, has forged me again. Stronger.
What was that? Don't think I will go easy on you.
Chosen by a god... It is no different than being cursed.
Being brought low is nothing new to me. I have learned to live with abasement.
Tell me truthfully. What is the nature of your relationship with Princess Fjorm?
Fjorm, one day... We...
If Princess Fjorm desires it, I shall lend you my strength.
Yes.
What are you thinking?
Let's hatch a plan.
